com.constantcontact
Class ConstantContact

java.lang.Object
  com.constantcontact.ConstantContact

public class ConstantContact
extends java.lang.Object

Main Constant Contact class.
This is meant to be used by users to access Constant Contact API functionality.
DO NOT USE SERVICE LAYER CALLS ON YOUR OWN, unless you have your own way of providing the OAuth access token AND data validation.
Class Contains a local instance of CtcOAuth2 and one from each Service :

  • ContactService
  • ContactListService
  • EmailCampaignService
  • AccountService
  • EmailCampaignScheduleService
  • EmailCampaignTrackingService
  • ContactTrackingService
  • BulkActivitiesService

Author:
ConstantContact

password - The password of the Constant Contact email account.
apiKey - The API key provided by Constant Contact.
redirectUrl - The redirect url.
